page.title: 20QUALITY OF LIFE TODAY
page.content:
To most people in the area living in the country means getting away from the stresses of life midst the bustle and grime of large towns and cities.
This is threatened at times by the increasing use of our rural roads by heavy vehicles, and we would like to see them excluded except for access. We would, however, like to have more buses.
A lot of us have lived around this area for many years, but others have chosen to come to this part of the country to settle. {We are fortunate {that our countryside has not been {spoilt but has been preserved for us {to enjoy.
{Edited by Rangemore Women's Institute
